Name: Outside the Window
About the game: Description Outside the Window is a simple pixel-artstyle city builder game. You need build your own city then relax and enjoy your results. Only Zen Mode and Hell Mode are included in the game. Gameplay You can decide the next 5 bricks randomly by choosing the group of bricks. After finish one level, you can continue to the next level. When bricks in the current page is empty, you can step into the next area. In Zen mode, You don't need to reach the scores to continue the game. In hell mode, the contact of different brick types will increase different scores. In Standard mode, you should achieve the goal to reach the next tier. About the developer This is Liujiajun and this little-weird game is my fourth game on Steam. I hope you love my game. At last, of course. Thanks for playing my game. If you have any question or suggestion, please free to contact me.
